body: I mean...because people keep twisting what NTR is, it should get it to warn people, but this isn't NTR. She's never stolen, there is no actual emotional wreckage going on here. Strictly speaking, whats going on is she's cucking him, but with the intent of keeping a relationship with him. She's still active with him and has him participating. But cuckold doesn't get its own tag here, so NTR is the closest.
